title: Marvel vs Capcom 2 Tier List
description: Discover the definitive tier list for Marvel vs Capcom 2, detailing the strengths and weaknesses of characters in S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier. Learn which characters dominate the game and how they stack up against each other.
heading: Marvel vs Capcom 2 Tier List
introText: Discover the definitive tier list for Marvel vs Capcom 2, detailing the strengths and weaknesses of characters in S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier. Learn which characters dominate the game and how they stack up against each other.

data.itemDescription: Incredible mobility and high damage output make Sentinel a top-tier character
Versatile character with powerful zoning and rushdown capabilities
Excellent speed and combo potential, making him a formidable opponent
Strong projectile game and high damage combos
Great assist character with solid offensive options
Versatile with strong zoning and assist moves
Capable of controlling space and setting up traps
Balanced character with good offensive and defensive tools
Similar to Iron Man, with a focus on zoning and combo potential
Good projectile game but lacks mobility
High damage but lacks mobility and versatility
Decent offensive tools but struggles against top-tier characters
Unique move set but lacks the tools to compete with higher tiers
High health and damage but slow and easy to counter
